Are we a match?

Currenlty I want to focus on designing products that leverage the best from new technologies, such as LLMs and speech analytics. I am capable of combining product design with product management responsibilities.

As a graduate architect, I will be a useful asset in products dedicated to emerging technologies in civil engineering, architecture and design.

But I'd love to hear from you if your product is just solving a real problem.

I don't work with crypto and iGaming.

a friendly and serious team building a useful product,

a hiring manager looking for a middle product designer, and that's why you are actually here,

an aspiring designer seeking an advice on something you think I am competent in,

try to help you out. Reach out to me.
